title: Is there a way to make Level Up spell 1 MouseButton4+Q?
body: In the menu level up spell 1 is Ctrl + Q, so is there a way to do that but with ctrl being mouse button 4.

replies.body:
At the moment we're still working on getting those mouse buttons 4/5 able to be bound again, but for now, I'm not 100% sure we'll be able to get that keybind onto ctrl+MB4.

If you have some type of gaming mouse/keyboard software we could try doing this in a little roundabout way. Sometimes you can rebind the MB4 to a different key, so let's try binding it to Q if you can. That way, when you hit MB4 it will register as Q.
